DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate anti-emetic effect oral ondansetron . For evaluation , investigator perform multi-center , double-blind , placebo-controled , randomize study . The investigator assumption oral ondansetron prior intramuscular ketamine reduce occurrence ketamine-induced vomiting .
